overview.base: You resist being surprised.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: As you attack, choose either arm or leg. The damage gets dealt accordingly.

results.hit: The target takes 1 hack damage on either an arm or leg, depending on what you chose.
results.critHit: The target takes 2 hack damage on either arms or legs, depending on what you chose.

overview.base: You become hidden. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your passive sneak ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your passive sneak.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, three-quarters cover, or some other feature which the GM determines is appropriate for being hidden. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay hidden.

results.hit: Target takes a body hack.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.

overview.base: Note: A target moving due to Knockback can still provoke reactions like Opportunity Attack.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: Your next attack is boosted.

system.endCondition: You make another attack.

results.hit: Target takes a vitals hack of your choice.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.
